skipRestore.description: If specified, skips the automatic restore of the project on create.

url.description: If specified, sets the Rundeck URL in the appsettings.json file.

username.description: If specified, sets the Rundeck username in the appsettings.json file.

password.description: If specified, sets the Rundeck password in the appsettings.json file.

postActions.description: Restore NuGet packages required by this project.
